summary: Comprehensive testing of EmptyState components, TruthTag verification badges, Share functionality, and User Settings persistence. All 17 backend API tests passed. All frontend features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: EmptyState components properly styled with matrix background, icons, action buttons, and error codes
TruthTag component fetches from /api/factcheck/{storyId} and displays confidence percentage with status icon
Share button uses Web Share API with clipboard fallback - clipboard permission error in automated testing is expected
Voice settings persist to MongoDB via /api/settings/{user_id}/voice endpoint
All EmptyState pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page
seed_data_creation: None - all data comes from backend APIs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features tested and working. Key data-testids: saved-page, saved-empty-state, go-to-feed-btn, offline-page, offline-empty-state, search-page, search-input, featured-card, featured-share-btn, share-btn-{id}, truth-tag-{storyId}, voice-studio-page, voice-card-{id}, apply-voice-btn. Backend APIs: /api/settings/{user_id}, /api/settings/{user_id}/voice, /api/factcheck/{storyId}.

emptystate_saved_page.empty_state_display: PASS - data-testid='saved-empty-state' displayed when no bookmarks
emptystate_saved_page.message: PASS - 'You have not saved any stories yet...' message shown
emptystate_saved_page.go_to_feed_btn: PASS - 'GO TO FEED' button with data-testid='go-to-feed-btn'

emptystate_offline_page.empty_state_display: PASS - data-testid='offline-empty-state' displayed when no cached audio
emptystate_offline_page.message: PASS - 'No offline content is available...' message shown

emptystate_search_page.no_results_display: PASS - 'NO_RESULTS_FOUND' heading displayed for non-matching query

truthtag_dashboard.featured_card_truthtag: PASS - TruthTag badge visible on featured story (shows confidence %)
truthtag_dashboard.stream_cards_truthtag: PASS - 15 TruthTag elements found on dashboard
truthtag_dashboard.truthtag_statuses: PASS - VERIFIED, UNVERIFIED, DISPUTED statuses with appropriate icons

share_functionality.featured_share_btn: PASS - data-testid='featured-share-btn' found on featured card
share_functionality.stream_share_btns: PASS - 14 share buttons found on stream cards
share_functionality.share_click: PASS - Share button clickable (clipboard permission error expected in automated testing)
share_functionality.web_share_api: PASS - Uses navigator.share with clipboard fallback

voice_studio_page.voice_cards: PASS - 5 voice cards displayed (Nova, Onyx, Echo, Alloy, Shimmer)
voice_studio_page.voice_variants: PASS - Standard, Pidgin, Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo variants shown
voice_studio_page.selected_voice_panel: PASS - Shows selected voice name and description

backend_settings_api./api/settings/{user_id}: PASS - Returns default settings for new users
backend_settings_api./api/settings/{user_id} POST: PASS - Saves user settings to MongoDB
backend_settings_api./api/settings/{user_id}/voice POST: PASS - Saves voice settings via query params

backend_factcheck_api./api/factcheck/{story_id}: PASS - Returns verification status based on story_id hash
backend_factcheck_api./api/factcheck/analyze POST: PASS - Analyzes text for keywords (confirmed, disputed, rumor, false)

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Dubawa fact-check API uses simulated responses based on story_id hash. Returns VERIFIED/UNVERIFIED/DISPUTED status with confidence percentage.
